project.name: Sense4us Simulation Client
project.description: Sense4us Simulation Client: a client for displaying simulations of policy changes.

sense4us.events.name: sense4us.events
sense4us.events.description:
This is an event handler, meaning that we can bind a callback
to an event.
This will then be called when we run the trigger-function.
This is basically a static function, so it's accessible from any place
using sense4us.
example:
We want the function eatPizza(pizza) to be called
on the event "pizzaDelivered":

sense4us.node.name: sense4us.node
sense4us.node.description:
Upon construction of this node object an html-element "div" will be created, unless
there's already an existing element with specified id.
This class facilitates the setting and getting node data-variables.
It does not store the data-variables locally, instead it sets and gets
them from the actual html-element.

params.name: id
params.description: This integer must be a unique identifier for this created node.

sense4us.graphics.name: sense4us.graphics
sense4us.graphics.description: A class to create the graphic for different objects.

classitems.description:
Bind a callback to an event. When the event is triggered, all callbacks
bound to the event will be called.
classitems.name: bind

params.name: callback
params.description: The callback to be called when event is triggered.

classitems.description: When an event is triggered, run all relevant callbacks with the data specified.
classitems.name: trigger

params.name: event
params.description: Name of the event that is triggered.

params.name: data
params.description: Object that is passed into the callback.

classitems.description: Sets an attribute on the html-element with the specified value.
classitems.name: set

params.name: name
params.description: This parameter is converted into data-%name% before storing the attribute in the html element.

classitems.description: Retrieves the attribute value by the specified attribute name.
classitems.name: get

params.name: name
params.description: This parameter is converted into data-%name% before retrieving the attribute.

classitems.description: A function to create the graphic for nodes.
classitems.name: node

params.name: node
params.description: The node for which to add graphics

params.name: stage
params.description: The stage that the graphic is displayed on.

warnings.message: replacing incorrect tag: returns with return
